metadata.raw:
Pesago Express (Civilian Starship)

The Pesago is the low end freighter meeting a maneuver-2, jump-3 requirement. It has an operating cost of 1212Cr per ton per fortnight (730 if it scoops its own fuel). Although it cannot compete on jump-1 runs, express freight contracts over a jump-3 usually give it a tidy profit margin.

There is no surplus power for any armament. If armament is desired a supplementary power suply must be added or else forgo the maneuver-2 preformance.

CraftID: Pesago Express Freighter, TL15, MCr802.346
Hull: 3688/9219, Disp=4097t, Config=4SL, Armour=40G,

Loaded=58050, Unloaded=13480

Power: 11/28, Fusion=3074MW, Duration=30/90
Loco: 184/461, Maneuver=2, 148/369, Jump=3, Cruise=750kph, Max=1000kph, Agility=0
